metadata.Title: CVE-2022-25309 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
fribidi: Heap-buffer-overflow in fribidi_cap_rtl_to_unicode

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2022-25309` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libfribidi-bin - 1.0.8-2ubuntu2.1
libfribidi0 - 1.0.8-2ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: rayveldkamp> For bionic affected function is in charset/fribidi-char-sets-cap-rtl.c

criterions.comment: fribidi package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.8-2ubuntu2.1').
